title: Linux System Administrator
description:
**Är du en erfaren Systemadministratör med djup kunskap inom Linux? Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär och arbeta med avancerade IT-lösningar inom drift och infrastruktur?** 




  





 Vi söker en
 **Linux Systemadministratör** 
 med några års erfarenhet som har passion för att skapa stabila och effektiva miljöer och som vill spela en nyckelroll inom IT-drift. Här får du arbeta med den senaste tekniken och bidra till att säkerställa högpresterande system och sömlös infrastruktur.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som Linux Systemadministratör kommer du att spela en viktig roll i ett driftteam och samarbeta nära med tvärfunktionella team för att säkerställa stabilitet och hög tillgänglighet i system. Du kommer att ha ansvar för att underhålla och optimera Linux-plattformar samt hantera olika aspekter av systemadministration och säkerhet. Din expertis kommer att vara avgörande för att upprätthålla en effektiv och säker IT-miljö, där du arbetar proaktivt för att identifiera och lösa eventuella tekniska utmaningar. Det är en roll där du får möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och bidra till utvecklingen av en stabil och framtidssäkrad infrastruktur.
 



  





**Vi tror att du är en driven systemadministratör som har:** 



* **Flera års erfarenhet av Linux** 
 (exempelvis Red Hat, CentOS, Ubuntu) med en förståelse för systemets ekosystem
* **Drift och underhåll av Linux-servrar** 
 , inklusive säkerhetskonfigurationer och nätverksadministration
* **Kunskap inom automatisering och scripting** 
 , gärna erfarenhet med verktyg som Ansible, Puppet eller liknande
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i
 **komplexa IT-miljöer med höga krav på tillgänglighet och säkerhet**
* Erfarenhet av
 **containerverktyg** 
 som Docker och Kubernetes för att hantera och skala applikationer
* Erfarenhet av
 **webbaserade och serverinriktade tjänster** 
 , till exempel Apache, Nginx och databassystem (SQL och noSQL)



  





**Meriterande erfarenhet** 



* Erfarenhet av
 **CI/CD-pipelines** 
 och automatisering av deploy-processer
* Kunskap om
 **säkerhetslösningar** 
 inom IT-infrastruktur och erfarenhet av avancerade säkerhetskonfigurationer
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med
 **HPC (High-Performance Computing)** 
 och GPU/vGPU-hantering
* Erfarenhet av
 **Linux VDI** 
 -lösningar och hantering av virtualiserade Linux-miljöer



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 Hos oss får du en stabil anställning med:
 


* Konkurrenskraftiga villkor och fast månadslön
* Möjligheter att utvecklas och specialisera dig inom ditt expertområde
* En öppen och trivsam arbetskultur med regelbundna aktiviteter för teamkänsla och gemenskap



  





**Om oss** 




 Vi är en ledande aktör inom drift och IT-infrastruktur och arbetar med marknadsledande företag inom en rad olika branscher. Här får du möjlighet att utvecklas inom avancerade projekt och arbeta med den senaste tekniken. Vi är måna om att våra medarbetare trivs och erbjuder en trygg och utvecklande miljö där du får stöd i din karriärutveckling.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Låter detta som ditt nästa steg? Urval sker löpande, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
 



  





 pauline.Ryott@nexergroup.com eller elin.lidstrom@nexergroup.com

title: System Architect for Scania Workshop Suite
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

**What We Do**
 We at Vehicle Service Information (EYS) are passionate about Uptime and Serviceability. We enable our workshops to be best in class in supporting our customers when they come in for a workshop visit.
   

  

 Daily, 16,000 Technicians maintain, troubleshoot and repair Scania vehicles and engines worldwide.
   

  

 To make sure our workshops can deliver world class services, we develop the tool suite SWS, Scania Workshop Suite. It’s a microservice based cloud solution with a web frontend. It’s mainly written in C#, Angular and JS. SWS is hosted in AWS . SWS interacts with Scania’s inhouse developed PDM system and together with our digital twin data provide the information and services the workshops need to excel. The solution also make use of edge computing and vehicle communication hardware developed internally.
   

  

**Your Assignment**
 The development team consists of around 12 cross functional sub teams with a DevOps approach. As a System architect you will be the bridge between the teams and the enterprise and solution architects.
   

  

 You will be the chairman for the architecture community of practice and make sure that the services developed are possible to maintain and deliver the right performance. As the solution consists of multiple micro services, it’s important that the architecture and standardization make them work together. You act as a coach for the teams when they implement, but also work pre-emptive to make sure our architecture vision and technology align with the business goals.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We are looking for someone who has great commitment to lead the system architecture development in our solution. You have a vision for the architecture, founded in theory and experience. You work as an informal leader to realize it, and you do that with respect for the individuals involved. You have a positive attitude and find it energizing to engage with many contact points. In your work, you will need extensive cross-functional collaboration where communication skills will be very important.
   

  

 We believe that you have a master’s degree in computer science and are fluent in both English and Swedish. We also believe that you have several years’ of experience developing cloud based solutions, preferably with an architect role. Experience from the automotive industry and embedded systems is meriting.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 A flexible work environment in a hybrid setup where we expect you to be at the office at least 3 days a week. A place to grow, learn and have fun while you do it.
   

  

 We can also offer other benefits such as free exercise at Scania’s own facility in Södertälje or wellness allowance, performance bonus, occupational pension, flexible working hours, lunch at reduced price, the opportunity for a staff car and much more.
   

  

**Further information**
 Selection will be done continuously
   

  

 For more information contact Patrik Rönnqvist, Head of Service Solution IT Coordination, +46855383174

title: Head of Product - SAP SuccessFactors Practice & Reporting
description:
* Flexible work locations within Europe or the UK.\*\*


 Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

 Role Summary
   

  

 Scania Group is seeking an expert operational leader to drive HR transformation through the strategic ownership of our SAP SuccessFactors platform. In this high-impact role, you will lead a global in-house team, guiding the implementation, optimization, and ongoing development of the SAP SuccessFactors suite while aligning with Scania’s digital roadmap.
   

  

 You will play a pivotal role in decommissioning a fragmented HR IT landscape, creating a cohesive, streamlined, and innovative HR tech environment. Your leadership will help ensure that Scania’s HR technology solutions deliver measurable value, foster collaboration, and enable digital innovation across the organization.
   

  

 As the Head of Global SAP SuccessFactors Practice, you will shape the future of Scania’s HR technology landscape, leading a strategic transformation that impacts the entire organization. You’ll collaborate with global leaders and teams, driving innovation and enabling Scania to achieve its HR and business objectives.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
  

  

  

* Team Leadership:
+ Lead, mentor, and develop a global team of SAP SuccessFactors professionals, fostering a high-performance and collaborative culture.
+ Set and manage performance goals and KPIs for the team to ensure successful project delivery and operational excellence.

* Strategic Ownership of the Digital Roadmap:
+ Drive the execution of Scania’s HR digital transformation roadmap, aligning with broader business objectives.
+ Lead the decommissioning of legacy and disparate HR IT systems, transitioning to a simplified ecosystem centered on SAP SuccessFactors.
+ Ensure full utilization of the SAP SuccessFactors platform as the foundation for Scania’s HR technology strategy.

* HR Technology Transformation:
+ Provide strategic guidance on leveraging the SAP SuccessFactors suite to drive HR efficiency and innovation.
+ Oversee the management of all SAP SuccessFactors modules, including Recruitment, Onboarding, Employee Central, Compensation, Talent Development, Learning, and Analytics.
+ Partner with stakeholders to align HR technology solutions with organizational needs and objectives.

* Optimization and Continuous Improvement:
+ Stay updated on advancements in SAP SuccessFactors and ensure continuous adoption of innovative practices.
+ Optimize global HR processes to ensure data accuracy, smooth operations, and enhanced system performance.
+ Implement secure data structures, role-based permissions, and robust reporting mechanisms to enable data-driven decision-making.

* Change Leadership:
+ Lead large-scale transformation initiatives, ensuring successful adoption of new HR technologies.
+ Champion engagement and user adoption, fostering a culture of innovation and agility across Scania.

* Collaboration and Stakeholder Management:
+ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including IT, HR, and external partners, to address challenges and enhance system integration.
+ Engage with senior global leaders to provide insights and strategic direction on HR technology initiatives.

* Compliance and Data Security:
+ Ensure all deployments comply with global HR policies, legal regulations, and data security standards.
+ Implement and maintain best practices in HR data governance to safeguard sensitive employee information while enabling strategic insights.


**Qualifications** 
  

  

  

* Experience:
+ 10+ years of experience leading HR transformation initiatives using SAP SuccessFactors in large, complex, and matrixed organizations.
+ Proven track record in strategic advisory roles, preferably with experience from top-tier consultancy firms.
+ Multiple up-to-date certifications in SAP SuccessFactors and expertise across its modules.

* Leadership:
+ Strong leadership skills with a history of managing, coaching, and inspiring global teams.
+ Experience managing large-scale HR technology projects with global stakeholders and delivering high-impact results.

* Strategic and Technical Expertise:
+ Deep understanding of SAP SuccessFactors modules, including Recruitment, Employee Central, Compensation, Talent Development, Learning, and Analytics.
+ Expertise in data structures, role-based permissions, and HR analytics, with experience leveraging AI and automation capabilities.
+ Strong knowledge of SAP SuccessFactors integration with other business systems.

* HR Technology Transformation:
+ Proven ability to deliver digital transformation by decommissioning legacy systems and driving the adoption of new HR technologies.
+ Awareness of HR technology trends and their application in global organizations.

* Change Management and Collaboration:
+ Demonstrated success in leading complex change initiatives, aligning global teams, and ensuring stakeholder buy-in.
+ Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships across diverse teams and senior leadership.


 Application
   

  

 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-01-31. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information about the role, please contact hiring manager Yolandi Menton, yolandi.menton@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Senior Talent Acquisition Partner
description:
Join Ericsson as a Senior Talent Acquisition Partner!
   

  

 Are you a dynamic recruiter eager to make a meaningful impact by joining our newly built in-house Talent Acquisition delivery team?
   

  

 At Ericsson, we’re building a next-generation Talent Acquisition organization that is as dynamic and forward thinking as the technology we pioneer. Our vision is to create a globally connected, highly consultative TA ecosystem that empowers you as a Senior TA Partner to act as strategic advisor to the business. This is a unique opportunity to join us and contribute to shaping a Talent Acquisition model from its very inception.
   

  

 About this opportunity:
   

  

 As a Senior TA Partner at Ericsson you will be working closely with our hiring leaders, leveraging cutting-edge technology, and using data-driven insights to make informed hiring decisions. You will be the linchpin in ensuring a seamless recruitment process from start to finish. You'll manage everything from crafting engaging job adverts to preparing candidates for their first day, all while delivering outstanding experiences for candidates and hiring managers.
   

  

 This isn’t just a job—it’s a chance to be at the forefront of an exciting transformation. Ericsson is reshaping how talent acquisition operates globally, and you'll be instrumental in crafting and implementing this vision. In this role, you’ll:
   

  

**Lead with Impact:** 
 Drive recruitment strategies that directly contribute to Ericsson’s mission and growth.
   

  

**Work with Cutting-Edge Tools:** 
 Utilize advanced AI-driven technologies to elevate the recruitment process.
   

  

**Promote Diversity & Inclusion:** 
 Be a champion for inclusive hiring practices, ensuring diverse talent pools and equitable opportunities.
   

  

**Grow Professionally:** 
 Benefit from continuous learning opportunities, certifications, and internal training programs.
   

  

 What you will do:
   

  

**Recruitment Excellence:** 
 Collaborate with hiring managers to craft compelling job adverts, align on role calibrations, and develop recruitment strategies leveraging data and market insights.
   

  

**Technology Mastery:** 
 Utilize advanced tools like Eightfold AI, LinkedIn Talent Insights, and video interview platforms to streamline talent matching, sourcing, and interview scheduling.
   

  

**Stakeholder Collaboration:** 
 Build strong relationships with hiring managers, HR teams, and cross-functional stakeholders to align on hiring needs and strategies.
   

  

**Candidate Experience:** 
 Act as a brand ambassador, ensuring clear and engaging communication with candidates from the first touchpoint through onboarding.
   

  

**Sourcing & Screening:** 
 Build pipelines using AI-driven tools, perform in-depth candidate sourcing, and conduct detailed pre-screen interviews to create a diverse and qualified talent pool.
   

  

**Seamless Interviewing:** 
 Manage interview coordination and prepare candidates for success, ensuring structured, objective feedback and consistent hiring practices.
   

  

 What you will do, continued
   

  

**Offer & Onboarding Leadership:** 
 Lead offer negotiations and employment contracts, and maintain engagement with candidates throughout the onboarding journey.
   

  

**Compliance & Data Integrity:** 
 Ensure all recruitment practices meet local and international laws, GDPR, and internal policies, maintaining the highest levels of data accuracy and confidentiality.
   

  

**Continuous Improvement:** 
 Stay ahead of recruitment trends, tools, and technologies through ongoing learning and professional development.
   

  

 What you will bring:
   

  

**Experience:** 
 Experience working as a full cycle 360 recruiter for a technology company, either in an in-house, agency or RPO environment. Experience recruiting for senior high complexity job roles.
   

  

**Skills:** 
 Excellent communication, relationship-building, and organizational skills.
   

  

**Education:** 
 A bachelor’s degree is a plus but not required.
   

  

**Personal Attributes:** 
 Adaptability, results orientation, creativity, resilience, and a commitment to ethical hiring practices.
   

  

 Our assessment process:
   

  

 This recruitment process includes one initial phone screen, followed by two behavioral interviews where we will assess the skills and behaviors we are seeking in our Senior Talent Acquisition Partners. The successful candidates will receive an offer to join our team after completed the full assessment process.
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 760901
   

  

 ]]>

title: Senior ML Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 We're an award-winning Google Cloud partner. We're the experts in transforming businesses and shaping the future of cloud technology. Join us and collaborate with top minds, build groundbreaking solutions, and make a real difference for our clients. Enjoy extensive professional development, global reach, and a supportive, Google-inspired culture. If you're passionate about the cloud, this is where you want to be.
   

  

 With over 13 years of experience in Google Cloud under our belt, offices in 18 countries and more than 600 experts, we have deployed practical innovation alongside Google. We focus on infrastructure modernisation, data management, smart analytics, application modernisation, and AI & machine learning.
   

  

 Curious about our projects? We got you: Check out our success stories
   

  

  

**Job Description**
**Day-to-day life**
* Design, develop, and deploy cutting-edge machine learning models – crafting bespoke AI solutions for our Nordic clients.
* Collaborate with data scientists, data engineers, and Google experts to overcome complex challenges and deliver impactful outcomes.
* Champion knowledge sharing and mentorship, guiding junior colleagues in the art of machine learning and fostering a culture of continuous learning.
* Stay at the forefront of Google Cloud AI/ML technologies, continuously expanding your expertise and exploring new possibilities.
* Confidently present solutions to clients, bridging the gap between complex algorithms and real-world business value, while actively cultivating and expanding those customer relationships.


 Want to know more?
 
 Check out our people stories on Youtube
   

  

  

**Qualifications**
 We're seeking a passionate and experienced ML Engineer with a proven track record in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models. You'll be a cloud enthusiast with a deep understanding of AI/ML principles and hands-on experience with cloud technologies. As a coding expert, you'll possess strong Python skills and a solid foundation in machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph).
   

  

  

  

 Excellent communication is essential – you'll build strong relationships with clients, translate their needs into innovative AI solutions, and present complex topics with clarity and confidence. You're a true collaborator, thriving in team environments where knowledge sharing and mutual support are paramount.
   

  

 Fluency in both
 **Swedish** 
 and
 **English** 
 is required.
   

  

  

**Additional Information**
**Why Choose Devoteam G Cloud?**
* Own the AI revolution: Dive into the exciting world of Generative AI and ML, playing a pivotal role in shaping projects around Google's groundbreaking Gemini foundation model.
* Innovative Impact: Work on the forefront of cloud technology at a globally recognized leader in Google Cloud solutions.
* Direct Google Connection: Collaborate closely with Google teams, shaping the future of cloud and AI.
* Unleash Your Expertise: Thrive in a fast-paced environment where sharing knowledge and success is paramount.
* End-to-End Impact: Drive complete business transformations, from strategy to implementation and beyond.
* Accelerate Your Career: Grow within a Google-inspired culture, gaining specialisations and certifications.


*"Partnering with Devoteam has been a highlight of our efforts at Google Cloud. Their dedication and expertise elevate every project we undertake together. It's truly a collaboration that delivers exceptional results." — Alexander Percivall, Senior Partner Engineer, Google Cloud Nordics, Stockholm, Sweden.*
 We do plenty of activities, like meet-ups, hackathons, and partnerships. Don’t lose any of them: follow us on LinkedIn
   

  

**Benefits**
* Encouragement and support for training and certification, in the form of coaching from other team members, cost coverage, and financial incentives.
* Challenging and rewarding assignments, many of which are end-to-end.
* A hybrid work model as standard, with flexible working hours and location to support your work-life balance.
* An international, diverse, and inclusive team.
* A human-centric and value-based company culture.
* Wellness grants for sports activities (5,000 SEK/year).
* A modern office in central Stockholm.
* Full provision of work tools.
* A variety of social events.


 Our culture is based on continuous learning and career development, supported by a genuine, inclusive, and expert team that really loves pizza.
   

  

  
   

  

 Want to know more about life at Devoteam? Check our Instagram page
   

  

 Ready to join an elite team? Apply for our Senior ML Engineer position and become part of something exceptional!
   

  

 Is this not the right position for you? Don’t worry, we have plenty of opportunities! Check out our Career page

title: Business Developer, Product Development Process Management
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

 Role Summary
   

  

 Our vision is: A streamlined and user-friendly Product Development Process. You would together with us have a direct impact on keeping it current, relatable, and relevant as we continuously improve to be better and better.
   

  

 To manage this, we focus on a holistic and global perspective, listening to all of our colleagues and customers - to keep it transparent and easy to navigate. This is where we need You!
   

  

 In our mission to develop and improve a clear Product Development Process that integrates all brands, sites and cultures, promoting efficiency, synergy, and innovation, your task will include to calmly, clearly, and effectively ensure that the muscles of the PD Process are working together in the same sport, according to the same rules but utilizing each player's strengths and skills.
   

  

 We are looking for a candidate who has worked with complex process development or on an operational level within any area of the PD process and understands how crucial the relatability of it is. It will require strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability ensure your customer feels heard.
   

  

 Job Responsibilities
   

  

 Your role and scope may vary over time according to the needs of the process and the team, but the initial main responsibilities are:
   

  

  

* Be part of an inclusive team focusing on the Product Development Process for all our colleagues and customers across TRATON.
* Manage and maintain governance and communication channels connected to our PD Process, with stakeholders and participants from all functional areas on operational as well as executive levels.
* Ensure clear and transparent communication of status and decisions to colleagues and stakeholders


 Who You Are
   

  

 To succeed in this role:
   

  

  

* You need to be confident to challenge yourself, your colleagues, and the cross functions to secure a successful delivery, and confirm our common commitment towards our goals.
* You have experience in change management, and thrive when utilizing great communications and leadership skills.
* You enjoy exploring new perspectives and turning them into concrete actions while keeping the speed up, with a clear focus on the existing processes and the clarity of communication.
* You are comfortable with your ability to consider high-level strategic connections, read the room, and identify blocking points through discussions, enabling the specifics to progress step by step.
* You enjoy the challenges of a diverse collaboration where we use the strengths throughout TRATON with our various approaches.


 You have relevant education from University as well as thorough working experience from Scania PD Process and preferably working within or directly connected with the TRATON group. Communicating on all corporate levels and being comfortable conducting management meetings and presenting complex issues in front of others is mandatory. You are fluent in English and Swedish or German is meriting.
   

  

 This Is Us
   

  

 We are a department with a big responsibility, to ensure that the Product Development Process (PDP) is reliable and available for all. We are responsible for the PDP of Scania, we are also driving the evolvement journey of the common PDP for TRATON.
   

  

 Together we support each other in large and small, utilizing our different backgrounds and experiences to build knowledge continuously. We are each other's work environment and laugh together, and navigate our way forward together.
   

  

 Scania Offers
   

  

 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-02-09. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Karin Dahlström, Head of PD Management, EYP, karin.dahlstrom@scania.com or +46855383326.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Senior Project Manager in Global Logistics
description:
Are you looking for new opportunities and want to take on a Senior Project Manager role, working within Scania Logistics Packaging, collaborating with all TRATON brands?
   

  

**About Us**
 The Packaging Department (OA) is part of the Scania Logistics Organization within Production, Procurement, and Logistics (PPL) Organization. The team has responsibility for Scania centralized packaging, including: strategy and execution, development, assortment, selection, systems, and the empty packaging pools within Scania. This role will collaborate closely with all Traton Group brands to support our strategy that we will develop and operate common intercontinental and regional logistics packaging networks with a common assortment, packaging concepts & standards.
   

  

**About The Role**
 This Senior Project Manager role is a new position within the Packaging Department. As a Senior Project Manager within our team, you will be managing Packaging strategic cross-functional and cross-brand projects. One major initiative for which you will be the project manager is the Traton common packaging assortment. This will include development and selection of new common physical packaging, common brand/supplier criteria, common systems, governance, execution within the brands, and overall change management.
   

  

 Logistics has an impact on almost all of Scania´s core processes and you will be a key player when it comes to shaping the future of Scania´s logistics strategy. We offer a job in an international environment with multiple contact surfaces, both internally and externally. Some travelling is to be expected in this role.
   

  

**Your Profile And Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate has a university degree (business area orientation desired) with a minimum 5-8 years of project management experience in cross-cultural, cross-brand, and/or cross-cultural projects. Experience within logistics and/or production strongly desired.
   

  

 You are also excellent in communications, fluent in English, and have strong interpersonal skills working with all levels of stakeholders. Communication skills in Swedish, German, and/or Portuguese is a plus. You are detail oriented, self-motivated, skilled in problem identification and resolution, and transparent.
   

  

 The position will require some domestic and international travel.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer a positive and collaborative work climate in a hybrid work set-up. In Logistics, continuous learning is natural; we are passionate about our work, and we support and challenge each other to grow and deliver results that make a difference for people, planet and profit.
   

  

 As an employee at Scania, we will offer you other benefits such as a wellness allowance, performance bonuses, occupational pension, flexible working hours, lunch at a reduced price, and much more. If you live in Stockholm, we also offer a direct bus service between Stockholm and Södertälje with Scania Jobexpress.
   

  

**Further information**
 Haley Wilson, Head of Packaging, haley.wilson@scania.com
   

  

**Application**
 Please send your CV, cover letter and copies of grades via scania.com as soon as possible and no later than February 3rd , 2025
   

  

 A background check is conducted for this position
   

  

 Scania is a world-leading supplier of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers, we drive the transition to a sustainable transport system. In 2022, we delivered 80,238 trucks, 4,994 buses and 13,400 industrial and marine engines to our customers. Net sales amounted to more than SEK 170 billion, of which over 21 percent was service-related. Scania was founded in 1891 and today operates in more than 100 countries and has approximately 57,000 employees. Research and development is mainly concentrated in Sweden. Manufacturing takes place in Europe and Latin America, with regional product centers in Africa, Asia and Eurasia. Scania is part of the TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com

title: Investment and Business Analyst
description:
Help us make smart financial decisions as we build a sustainable business as our next Investment and Business Analyst!
 



  





**Job description** 




 As Investment and Business Analyst you will have an important role in the company’s Finance department. The role will include responsibility of preparing and quality assurance of investment calculations, site economics and financial evaluation of sites. The position will also contribute to further develop internal processes and systems.
 



 Recharge is looking for a person with an analytical mindset and a high level of financial understanding. A background from similar positions and/or audit is positive. The company is in a growth phase, and you should be a person who thrives in an active environment with a high level of engagement and versatile tasks.
 



  





**Key responsibilities** 



* Investment calculation model included develop and extend model.
* Site Economics analyses.
* Analysis and quality assurance of KPIs.
* Analysis and assurance of operational- and investment costs.
* Product owner of PowerBI dashboards.
* Ad-hoc analyses and financial support across departments.



  





**Success factors** 



* Five years relevant experience (audit, controlling, analyst etc.).
* Master’s degree within Finance.
* High level of competence in Excel.
* Analytical mindset.
* Excellent English proficiency (Group language).
* Proficiency with PowerBI.



  





 We believe that the right candidate has a genuine interest in the green shift and is either already driving an EV or is very interested in doing so in the near future.
 



  





**What can we offer?** 




 We offer you a role within a team advancing sustainable transportation and creating a greener future. Your work will have a direct impact on shaping the electric vehicle future. Our core values are Care, Share and Dare where we focus on building a better future in a rapidly growing business, together.
 



  





 · Subsidized EV-charging
 



 · Flexible working hours and hybrid office
 



 · Development opportunities and career opportunities
 



 · An inclusive working environment in a Nordic company
 



 · Very good pension and insurance schemes
 



 · Health Insurance
 



 · Modern and central location in Moss / Oslo / Stockholm
 



  





**Interested?** 




 Do you want to start an exciting and meaningful journey with Recharge and have a lot of fun on the way? Please apply before January 31. Interviews will be conducted coninuously and the position may be filled before end of application period.
 



 Recharge values diversity. Even if you do not meet all of the qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
 



  





**Place of work:** 
 at our HQ in Moss, office in central Oslo or office in central Stockholm. Some traveling will be required, primarily within the Nordic region. This role reports to Chief Financial Officer.
 



  





**Application deadline:** 
 Please apply no later than 31-01-2025. Position open until filled. Please apply by uploading your CV and application letter through our recruitment system Nuu.
 



 Questions about the position can be directed to: Helene Francke, Chief Financial Officer: Helene.Francke@rechargeinfra.com or through our recruitment system Nuu.
 



  





*We do background checks on relevant candidate via our partner Semac AS.*

title: Junior Linux Kernel Engineer - Ubuntu
description:
Every year we select new junior professionals into the Canonical kernel team, to work on the Linux kernel for Ubuntu. If you've enjoyed operating systems in your coursework or current role, you are confident in your ability to write high quality C and possibly Rust, and are ready to take the plunge and see how it all works, then this would be a great place to pursue your next career stage. We are a global team working to ship the world's most widely used Linux kernel, across the very latest silicon and cloud, where you can apply and grow your software engineering skills.
   

  

 The Canonical Kernel Team builds and maintains all supported Ubuntu Linux kernels for a variety of platforms and architectures from small embedded devices to standard desktop/server systems to large-scale cloud environments. In your first year you will tackle serious initiatives, which include but are not limited to:
   

  

* Optimized solutions for key Silicon and Cloud partner platforms
* Developer platforms such as Raspberry Pi and RISC-V
* Enabling Ubuntu on a wide range of embedded systems
* Security hardening and exploit mitigation
* Third-party driver integration and distribution, such as graphics
* Expanded driver support for bleeding-edge PC platforms


 We select candidates that are recent university graduates or early career professionals who are enthusiastic to develop kernel-level software in multiple areas including security updates, patching, and testing. The successful candidate will have a background in software engineering, be motivated to work in a distributed team and willing and able to travel globally twice a year for company engineering events.
   

  

 These are full-time positions available to early career candidates (1-3 years industry experience), recently graduated university students, or university students with less than 3 months before graduation. The Kernel Team is currently not offering any part-time or internship roles.
   

  

**Location:** 
 We have home-based kernel teams in every timezone.
   

  

 What your day will look like
   

  

* Collaborate regularly and proactively with a globally distributed team
* Learn from senior mentors to demystify the inner workings of the Linux kernel and how it is distributed
* Work closely with external silicon, cloud, or hardware manufacturer delivery teams on bleeding-edge platforms
* Diagnose and resolve issues in the kernel reported by customers, the community, and discovered by your own rigorous testing
* Take personal responsibility for the delivery of various flavors of the Ubuntu Linux kernel
* Improve tooling and automation for delivery and test of Ubuntu Linux kernels
* Submit, review, and apply kernel patches, working with both internal and external upstream maintainers


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Well-organized and motivated self-starter able to thrive in a remote work environment
* Professional manner with colleagues, business partners, and the open-source community
* Ability to communicate effectively in English, both written and verbal
* Programming experience in C and/or Rust
* Familiarity with version control practices, ideally with git
* Understanding of operating system kernel fundamentals
* Ability to travel twice a year for company events of up to two weeks length


**Additional Skills That You Might Also Bring**
* Interest and experience in Rust
* Python and Bash scripting ability
* Prior experience with Ubuntu/Debian/Snap packaging
* Demonstrated experience with kernel patching and debugging
* Strong grasp of device drivers, BSP's, and other low level system engineering


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Home-based work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Supporttekniker
company_industry: Human Resources Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Inför 2025 söker vi nu flera supporttekniker till olika uppdrag ute hos våra kunder. Det kan vara inom 1st line support, 2:nd line eller som onsite tekniker.
 



 Du ska tycka det är roligt att ge support via telefon, mail, chatt eller vid direktkontakt med kunder och användare. Du trivs med att ge det där lilla extra och har en hög servicekänsla. Du behöver samtidigt vara van vid att jobba i en miljö där saker och ting händer snabbt och där du ibland behöver växla fokus och ha många bollar i luften samtidigt.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Minst 1-2 års arbetserfarenhet i en supportroll
* Kunskaper inom AD, Azure, O365, ITIL, ärendehanteringsverktyg (ex JIRA, ServiceNow), Citrix, Windows10/11, hårdvara, printers, installationer av OS och programvaror, teamviewer.
* Du behöver kunna kommunicera på både svenska och engelska i såväl tal som skrift. Många av våra kunder förväntar sig att du är bekväm i båda språken och obehindrat kan använda dig av båda. Talar du även finska, norska eller danska är det ett extra stort plus. Du tycker om problemlösning, är nyfiken, intresserad och engagerad samtidigt som du inger förtroende och kan ta ansvar när det behövs.



  





**Ansvarsområde** 




 Du kommer att arbeta som konsult i uppdrag ute hos någon av våra kunder. Där kommer du få introduktion i arbetsuppgifterna och där kunden arbetsleder det dagliga arbetet.
 



 Du kommer hjälpa kunderna med deras IT relaterade ärenden och problem och lösa så mycket du kan vid en första kontakt.

title: Produktionschef Asfalt Entreprenad - Stockholm
description:
*Skanska Industrial Solutions erbjuder helhetslösningar inom asfalt, bergmaterial, betong, infraservice och rental. Vi är ett helägt dotterbolag inom Skanska Sverige AB.*
*Vår verksamhet inom asfalt och bergmaterial levererar olika bergprodukter samt tillverkar och lägger asfalt. Vi tar också emot, bearbetar och återanvänder schaktmassor och asfalt.*
 Till vår beläggningsverksamhet i Stockholmsområdet söker vi nu
   

  

**Lyhörd produktionschef som tar beslut och får saker att hända**
 Som produktionschef ansvarar du för att planera, leda och styra vår beläggningsverksamhet. Du har ekonomiskt ansvar för projekten, vilket innebär budgetering, prognos och uppföljning. Arbetsmiljö- och kvalitetsarbete ingår också i din roll. Du kommer att ha kundansvar och kontakt med såväl interna som externa aktörer.
   

  

 Du har arbetsledare till hjälp i din geografi och tillsammans leder ni ett team med egna anställda och underentreprenörer.
   

  

 Att arbeta som produktionschef hos oss innebär en varierad vardag där ingen dag är den andra lik. Många pågående projekt av varierande storlek och komplexitet gör att planering och samarbete är A och O i din vardag.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter är:
   

  

  

* Att ansvara för affären i sin helhet
* Att leda planeringen av enheter med fokus på hög produktivitet
* Att skapa och underhålla långsiktiga kundrelationer
* Ekonomistyrning.


 Att upprätthålla täta kontakter med våra beställare, leverantörer och kunder är en viktig del av din vardag och avgörande för optimal planering av arbetet.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Du är en naturlig ledare!**
 Den vi letar efter till rollen som produktionschef har flerårig erfarenhet av entreprenadverksamhet, ett naturligt och tydligt ledarskap och är van att leda personal i daglig produktion. Du känner dig trygg i ditt ledarskap som du baserar på transparens och delaktighet.
   

  

 Förändringar i produktionen och ett högt tempo är inget du räds, utan snarare något du hämtar energi ifrån. Du är driven, beslutsam och har god prioriteringsförmåga samt har ett genuint intresse för affären, kvalitet och säkerhet. Att arbeta nära kunden från anbud till slutbesiktningar är något du är bra på och tycker om.
   

  

 Du har troligen:
   

  

  

* Några års erfarenhet i ledande roll från asfalt-, entreprenad- eller anläggningsbranschen
* Teknisk utbildningsbakgrund med inriktning mot väg/anläggning, beläggning/entreprenad eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Goda IT kunskaper, erfarenhet av Office-programmen samt affärs och planeringssystem, som tex C7
* Bra språkkunskaper i svenska
* B-körkort, vilket är ett krav i tjänsten.


**Vi behöver din ansökan senast 11 februari!**
 Men vänta inte, ansök gärna redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med ansökningarna.
   

  

 Om du har frågor angående tjänsten får du gärna kontakta rekryterande chef Johan Hugolf på 070-397 66 50.
   

  

 Välkommen till en ny utmaning11
   

  

 Våra medarbetare är vår främsta styrka och det är viktigt att du känner dig trygg hos oss. Vi vill att du ska trivas på jobbet och ha kul med dina kollegor. Vi lovar dig som medarbetare en ständig kompetensutveckling och tillhandahåller en rad internutbildningar, befattningsspecifika program och internationella utvecklingsmöjligheter. För oss är hälsa och säkerhet extra viktigt och det ligger även som grund för våra förmåner till dig som anställd på Skanska.

title: LRS VPX Level 3 Transition SME
description:
Hiring\_ LRS VPX Level 3 Transition SME
 



  





 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 Job type: Contract
 



  





 Job Description:
 



  





 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced LRS VPSX Level 3 Transition Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will possess expertise in output management and core LRS architecture, with a focus on label and bulk print solutions. This role is pivotal in ensuring seamless transitions and efficient management of output solutions for our clients.
 



  
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



 - Lead and manage LRS VPSX transitions, ensuring minimal disruption to operations.
 



 - Implement and configure LRS VPSX architecture for label and bulk print solutions.
 



 - Provide Level 3 support for troubleshooting and resolving complex issues related to LRS VPSX.
 



 - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy output management solutions.
 



 - Conduct performance tuning and optimization of output management systems.
 



 - Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for LRS VPSX configurations and processes.
 



 - Train and mentor Level 1 and 2 support teams on LRS VPSX architecture and troubleshooting techniques.
 



 - Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices in output management.
 



 - Participate in project planning and execution, providing technical expertise and guidance.
 



  
 



  
 



 Required Skills and Qualifications:
 



 - Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
 



 - Extensive experience with LRS VPSX architecture and output management solutions.
 



 - Proficiency in configuring and managing label and bulk print solutions within the LRS VPSX framework.
 



 - Strong troubleshooting skills and experience with providing Level 3 support.
 



 - Excellent understanding of print management, print servers, and related technologies.
 



 - Experience with performance tuning and system optimization in an output management context.
 



 - Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
 



 - Proven ability to develop and maintain technical documentation.
 



 - Familiarity with industry standards and best practices in output management.
 



  
 



  
 



 Preferred Qualifications:
 



 - Relevant certifications in LRS VPSX or related technologies.
 



 - Experience with additional print management and output management solutions.
 



 - Knowledge of scripting languages and automation tools for output management.

title: Mid-Market Cloud Advisor
description:
**Company Description**
 Devoteam is a leading technology partner to Google Cloud, AWS, and Microsoft across EMEA. With 20+ years of successful Google Cloud implementations and a team of certified experts, we drive digital transformation across various industries.
   

  

 At Devoteam, we champion a revolutionary "New Way of Work" that prioritises flexibility, personal growth, and joint success.
   

  

  
   

  

  

**Job Description**
 Drive Digital Transformation: Become a Mid-Market Cloud Advisor
   

* As a Cloud Advisor for Google Cloud and other cloud technologies at Devoteam, you will play a crucial role in expanding our footprint across the Nordics and DACH. You will be responsible for:
* Hunting for New Business: Identify and acquire new customers with a focus on medium-sized businesses, generating leads and building strong relationships with key decision-makers.
* Driving Revenue Growth: Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve ambitious targets, exceeding customer expectations and contributing to Devoteam's continued success with hyperscalers and ISVs.
* Mastering the Sales Cycle: Own the entire sales process, from initial contact and needs analysis to proposal development, negotiation, and closing deals.
* Building Long-Term Partnerships: Cultivate strong relationships with existing clients, identifying opportunities to expand our services and ensure their ongoing success in all areas of their technology procurement.


 Staying Ahead of the Curve: Maintain a deep understanding of the evolving Cloud ecosystem, including new products, services, and market trends.
   

  

  
   

  

 Success Stories:
   

  

*"Joining Devoteam in the Nordics has been a transformative experience. The support from the local tech teams and the clear growth path have enabled me to consistently exceed my sales targets."
   

  

 — Aliha Mahmood, Junior Sales, Sweden*
*"Transitioning from Google to Devoteam has been a remarkable experience. The collaborative culture and unwavering commitment to innovation at Devoteam have empowered me to utilize my Google Cloud expertise to its fullest potential. Working with cutting-edge Google Cloud solutions here has significantly advanced my career and allowed me to deliver exceptional value to our clients."
   

  

 — Thomas Brunn, Sales Executive, Norway*
 Territory
   

* You'll be working with startups and mid-market corporations across the Nordic or the DACH region, primarily digital natives.


  

  

**Qualifications**
* Proven Hunter: Demonstrated success in acquiring new customers and closing deals in the IT project business, with a focus on hyperscaler technologies.
* Solution-Oriented Mindset: Ability to understand client challenges and translate them into effective Cloud solutions.
* Strong Communication & Presentation Skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively articulate the value proposition of Cloud to C-level executives.
* Relationship Builder: A natural networker who can build rapport and establish trust with clients and internal stakeholders.
* Results-Driven: Highly motivated and results-oriented, with a strong work ethic and a commitment to exceeding expectations.
* Languages: Excellent written and spoken English skills are essential. Fluency in a Nordic language is a plus. In DACH fluent German is a requirement.



  
 

  
 

  
 

  
 

  
 

  
 
  
   

  

  

**Additional Information**
 Devoteam is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected. We encourage applications from individuals with diverse backgrounds and experiences.
   

  

  

  

 Benefits:
   

* Flexible Work Arrangements: Enjoy a hybrid work model with the freedom to choose your working hours and location.
* Career Development: Access to the Devoteam Academy for certified training and language courses, supporting your professional growth.
* International Opportunities: Explore potential career opportunities within our global network.
* Vibrant Culture: Be part of a dynamic and supportive team with regular social events and team-building activities.

title: Senior Data-arkitekt
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vi har behov av att modernisera plattformen för data och analys. Idag finns analysplattformen on premises, men ser att vi i framtiden behöver ha möjlighet att lägga delar av plattformen i molnet. Vi söker en dataarkitekt som kan stötta oss i detta arbete. Arbetet inkluderar allt från datamodellering på detaljnivå såväl som framtagande av arkitekturförslag på högre nivå. Arbetet sker i tätt samarbete med plattformsteamen, datateamen samt övriga IT-team.
   

  

 För att lyckas med uppdraget behövs en förståelse för de olika informationsmängderna vi hanterar samt hur informationen bäst konsumeras i verksamheten. Det behövs även djup teknisk kunskap om on premises-lösningar baserade på containerteknik samt hybrida lösningar för datahantering och analys. Rollen innefattar en stor del kommunikation och kräver driv och engagemang. Det krävs också kunskap i att implementera en föreslagen arkitektur.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med att fram arkitektur för moderna datamangement- och analyslösningar (AI/ML) i hybrida miljöer
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att kravställa moderna datamanagement lösningar
* Erfarenhet av att implementera och bygga upp moderna data management lösningar
* Erfarenhet av och ha arbetat med Python- och R-utveckling samt plattformar för detta
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes och containerteknik kopplat till data och analys samt AI/ML
* Förståelse och erfarenhet att säkerställa it-säkerhet inom data management arkitektur och utveckling
* Arbetat med databasmodellering och informationsmodellering för data warehouses.
* Arbetat med ETL/ELT-verktyg i minst tre år
* Arbetat med business intelligence-lösningar i minst fem år
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av Microsoft SQL Server
* Arbetat med Kimballmodellering i data marts i minst tre år
* Erfarenhet och ha arbetat med CI/CD-principer och DevOps inom data warehouseutveckling
* Arbetat med data governance och data catalogs
* Arbetat med SQL i relationsdatabaser för data warehouses
* Akademisk utbildning inom it eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt SAFe-ramverket
* Erfarenhet av open source-produkter inom data och analys
* Erfarenhet av OpenMetadata
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram strategier och riktlinjer inom datahantering
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med GDPR-säkring av data warehouse-lösningar
* Erfarenhet av automatisering av data pipelines och warehouse-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av data vaultmodellering
* Erftarenhet av agilt arbete och /eller SAFE-ramverket
* Erfarenhet av arbete med data lakes
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med databaslösningar kopplade till machine learning-modeller
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med prestandaoptimering för datawarehouselösningar
* Erfarenhet av SAS datawarehouselösning
* Erfarenhet av DevOps inom ETL-utveckling och data-management.
* Erfarenhet av arbete inom finans-/försäkringsbranscherna
* Erfarenhet av uppdrag inom bank och finanssektorn


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 23-01-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Python architect
description:
**About Us:** 




 At Dabster, we excel in connecting top-tier professionals with renowned global companies. We seek a skilled Python Architect
 
 to enhance our client’s team. Our goal is to lead the recruitment industry by securing outstanding talent for a broad spectrum of international clients
 



  





**Key responsibilities**




 • Development of python programs using pure python, pandas, Polars.
 



 • Design and implement solutions to meet business requirements
 



 • Support and maintenance
 



 • Develop and maintain metadata, user access and security controls
 



 • Provide technical support for users and resolve system issues
 



 • Develop and maintain technical documentation, including data models, process flows and system diagrams
 



  





**Description of knowledge and experience**




  





**Requirements**




 • Minimum 8-9 years of experience in Python programming language. Should have worked with 3rd party libraries like pandas, polars etc.
 



 • Experience in Orchestration, cache techniques, API’s and working on cloud platforms.
 



 • Experience in solutioning and architecting applications.
 



 • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
 



 • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to work in a team environment
 



 • Strong attention to detail and ability to work under pressure
 



  





**Preferred**

**What we offer:** 




 Rate: Competitive Salary
 



 Hybrid Work Model: Flexibility to work both remotely and on-site...

**How to Apply** 




 Apply by submitting your resume today via LinkedIn or send it to chethan.as@dabster.net, showcasing your relevant experience and passion for the position.

title: Tech Lead - Microsoft Server
description:
**Om Bankgirot** 




 En omvälvande transformation av betalsverige – där du behövs!
 



  





 Bankgirot söker nu en Tech Lead med fokus på Microsoft Server till en växande del av organisationen i Stockholm. Bankgirot har en unik ställning på Sveriges betalmarknad som nu genomgår den största transformationen i modern tid. Vår IT-organisation är i en tillväxtfas för att utveckla framtidssäkrade lösningar som följer internationell standard och regelverk. Samtidigt ser vi till att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar säkert och stabilt – varje dag.
 



  





 Arbetet med att utveckla framtidens betalinfrastruktur är i full gång och vi behöver dig som vill vara en del av resan. Som Tech Lead kommer du att spela en viktig roll i uppdraget att säkerställa framtidens betalinfrastruktur på ett teknikbolag där vi har ett stort hjärta för uppdraget – och varandra.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 I rollen som Tech Lead med fokus på Microsoft Server kommer du få en nyckelroll inom utveckling och förvaltning av Bankgirots infrastruktur. Du kommer att tillhöra Bankgirots driftsorganisation och spela en central roll i att säkerställa att teknikteamets arbete sker i linje med best practices och strategier för design och arkitektur. Vi söker dig som kan agera som en brygga mellan teknikteamet, övriga delar av driftorganisationen och utvecklingsteam. Du blir en viktig länk för att se till att Bankgirots tekniska lösning möter både nuvarande och framtida behov genom kontinuerlig förbättring.
 



  





**I rollen kommer du att:** 



* Utveckla och implementera strategier för Microsoft Server-området samt vara delaktig i arbetet med att etablera arbetssätt och organisation
* Säkerställa en robust, säker och effektiv utveckling och drift av Microsoft Server
* Leda och koordinera tekniska projekt som involverar design, implementering och underhåll inom Microsoft Server-området
* Säkerställa kunskapsöverföring och coacha medarbetare och leverantörer för att stärka teknikteamets kompetens
* Säkerställa att dokumentation är uppdaterad och finns på plats
* Säkerställa att den tekniska lösningen för Microsoft Server uppfyller krav och är i linje med målarkitektur



  





**Om dig** 




 Vi söker dig som drivs av att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du kan vara med och forma och implementera lösningar och förbättringar. Du har förståelse för helheten och arbetar strukturerat och analytiskt för att driva utvecklingen inom ditt område. Du strävar efter att leverera högkvalitativa resultat med säkerhet i fokus.
 



  





 För att du ska lyckas och trivas i rollen som Tech Lead krävs det att du har en god samarbetsförmåga och du förväntas ta en central roll mellan teknikteamet, driftorganisationen och utvecklingsavdelningen.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Erfarenhet av Windows Server administration, hantering av Windows Server inklusive installation, konfiguration, uppdateringar, och felsökning av serverroller och funktioner
* Erfarenhet av Active Directory, hantering av användare, grupper, säkerhetsprinciper, och domänstruktur via AD, inklusive GPO-konfiguration och replikeringshantering
* Erfarenhet av implementering av säkerhetspolicyer, hantering av rättigheter, nätverkssäkerhet, och efterlevnad av säkerhetsstandarder
* Erfarenhet av skriptning och automation för att effektivisera uppgifter och hantera storskaliga servermiljöer
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med serverlösningar med högt ställda krav på tillgänglighet och kontinuitet
* Gedigen kunskap inom IT-arkitektur
* Kunskap om säkerhet relaterat till Microsoft Server-området
* Erfarenhet av ledarskap och modern arbetsmetodik inom agila arbetssätt



  





**Ett utvecklande arbete med bra förmåner** 




 Som vår nya kollega blir du en del av ett kompetent och positivt team där vi samarbetar och sätter högt värde på varandras kompetens och erfarenheter. Du är med och driver spännande satsningar där vi stärker vår operativa förmåga ytterligare och använder den senaste tekniken.
 



 På Bankgirot känner du dig snabbt välkommen in i gemenskapen. Här hjälps vi gärna åt, ger varandra beröm och tar hand om varandra. Om vi mår bra och har balans i livet kan vi också leverera med kvalitet. Därför satsar Bankgirot mycket på hälsa och välmående och erbjuder generösa förmåner för dig som medarbetare.
 



  





**Övrig information** 




 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning baserad i Liljeholmen i Stockholm. Du behöver ha goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska. Innan anställning beslutas genomförs en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).
 



  





 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar. Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar. Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se
 



  





*Bankgirot samarbetar med Safemind för denna rekrytering.*

title: Account Manager
description:
**ACCOUNT MANAGER**
 Are you a TikTok pro? Do you think Google Search is for boomers? Are you ready to join an ambitious team in an amazing office space where the coffee is strong, and the cookies are even better? If you’re nodding along, keep reading.
   

  

 As we gear up for an exciting growth journey at INC Media, our performance agency, the Account Manager role is pivotal. You’ll be at the heart of driving campaigns to deliver great results, ensuring client satisfaction, and building long-lasting relationships from one campaign to the next. We believe the key to success is simple: talk the talk and walk the walk.
   

  

 Still nodding? Let’s dive in!
   

  

**Role Overview**
 In your role as an Account Manager, you will be pivotal in driving and optimizing our campaigns. Your main responsibility is to ensure the correct and efficient delivery of content to the right audience across various digital platforms. This involves daily communication with clients and influencers, as well as active work in our internal systems to set up structures and manage budgets for the clients you are responsible for. You will also support our budget goals and strategies through your involvement in delivery.
   

  

 It is a diverse role, where you have the opportunity to grow, handle strategic yet fast-paced tasks, and use both brain and social skills to achieve results. Our client relationships are key – and you will be a big part of nurturing these.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Build and maintain strong client relationships, understanding their needs and business goals.
* Develop project plans for influencer marketing campaigns, considering client objectives, target audience, and budget constraints.
* Manage client partnerships through planning, budgeting, contracting, and forecasts.
* Proactively develop additional business initiatives for existing clients.
* Handle daily client and influencer communication efficiently and resolving issues.
* Execute campaigns from start to finish, ensuring all elements are delivered within deadlines and budget scope.
* Ensure relevant campaign KPIs are accurate, monitored, and met.
* Conduct post-project evaluations and follow-ups with clients.
* Conduct research and analysis to identify target audiences and market trends.
* Monitor performance metrics and provide regular reports to clients, highlighting results and recommendations.
* Work across internal departments to guarantee seamless collaboration.
* Network with contacts, influencers, and people relevant to our business.


**Qualifications**
* Relevant postgraduate or professional degree in marketing and/or communication.
* Proven experience in influencer marketing from an agency or brand.
* Strong project management skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize competing deadlines.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for collaborating with cross-functional teams, clients, and influencers.
* Proficiency in using campaign management software and analytics tools to track and measure campaign performance.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities to develop innovative campaign ideas and solutions.


**Personal Attributes**
* Entrepreneurial mindset with a willingness to learn and grow in a small but dedicated team.
* Strong drive and a proactive approach to work.


 Candidates are reviewed continuously, please provide your application at your earliest convenience.

title: Verksamhetsarkitekt till SOS Alarm
company_industry: Public Safety and Health and Human Services
description:
**Verksamhetsarkitekt till SOS Alarm** 




  





*På SOS Alarm har vi ett viktigt uppdrag: att skapa trygghet för alla, dygnet runt, året om. Vi utvecklar smarta lösningar och tjänster som stärker samhällets förmåga att hantera kriser, olyckor och nödsituationer.* 




  





*Vi söker nu en Verksamhetsarkitekt som vill vara med och vidareutveckla vår verksamhet och samtidigt bidra till ett tryggare Sverige.* 




*Är du den vi söker?* 




  





  





**Din vardag som Verksamhetsarkitekt** 




 Som verksamhetsarkitekt hos oss arbetar du med strategiska och operativa frågeställningar där du säkerställer effektivitet och kvalitet i vår verksamhet samt skapar förutsättningar för hållbara IT-lösningar. Du är en viktig länk mellan verksamhetens behov och våra tekniska lösningar.
 



  





 I rollen kommer du bland annat att:
 



  




* Utföra behovsanalyser för att skapa insikter och förståelse för verksamhetens och kunders behov.



  




* Med hjälp av visualiseringar och strukturer skapa en gemensam förståelse för hur olika behov påverkar verksamheten.



  




* Ta fram lösningsförslag tillsammans med dina kollegor.



  




* Delta i initiativ som syftar till att förbättra verksamhetens arbetssätt eller IT-stöd.



  




* Underhålla och vidareutveckla framtagna strukturer som t.ex. förmågekarta.



  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och initiativ värdesätts.
* Goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Kollegor med ett stort engagemang och en stark laganda.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med samhällskritiska verksamhetsfunktioner som ständigt behöver finnas tillgänglig.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att arbeta i en hybridlösning - en kombination av arbete på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och på distans.



  





 Vår kultur präglas av våra värderingar:
 



**Professionella & Empatiska** 
 samt
 **Ansvarstagande & Samverkande** 
 .
 



  





  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du känner igen dig i följande påståenden:
 


* Du har en
 **hög analytisk förmåga.**
* Du har erfarenhet av arbete med
 **förmågekartor och behovsanalyser** 
 . Har du även arbetat med informationsmodellering är detta meriterande.
* Du har lätt för att skapa dig en övergripande förståelse för komplexa verksamhets- och IT-miljöer.
* Du har med fördel en bakgrund från liknande roller alternativt roller som exempelvis lösningsarkitekt.
* Du har en god kommunikativ förmåga och kan enkelt förklara olika perspektiv för olika målgrupper och därigenom skapa en god förståelse för både IT och verksamhet.
* Du gillar att dela med dig av information och arbeta tillsammans med andra.



  





  





**Ansökan** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Mukka (Linda.mukka@houseofskills.se) eller Linda Freij (Linda.freij@houseofskills.se)
 



 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



  





  





*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.* 




  





  





***Mer om SOS Alarm***




*Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.*
