Previous experience in HR-tech
  
---
  
The role will available until 2025-01-31 and all applications will be reviewed thereafter. The role is located on-site in Stockholm.

title: Platform Specialist
description:
AboutRedeploy RunAt Redeploy Run, we specialize in platform engineering and operations, helping our customers simplify their infrastructure and speed up application delivery. Our mission is to make cloud adoption faster and easier.Our 'Ready-to-Run' platform products, including Technology Platforms and Industry Cloud Platforms, let IT departments and developers manage infrastructure and governance with ease. Leveraging Infrastructure as Code, container-based services, CI/CD, and Kubernetes, and collaborating with cloud providers like Azure and AWS, we tackle complex problems, enhance our tools, and provide guidance to help customers get the most of their cloud platforms. Learn more about us here.As a rapidly growing cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for our next Platform Specialist in Stockholm who wants to be a part of our continued success story. Maybe it's you?What it means to be a Platform Specialist at Redeploy Run As a Platform Specialist, you'll join Redeploy Run’s Product team, focusing on operations as well as developing and refining our Ready-to-Run Cloud and Technology platform products for our customers in the Nordics. We're steadily implementing and onboarding new customers and are continuously improving our offerings. With increasing demand for our services, we now need to strengthen our team. In this role, your mission will be to help clients unlock the full potential of their Azure and AWS infrastructure environments and further develop our products with your Product team colleagues.Some of your tasks will amongst others be:
  
Work on consultant assignments such as architectural advice and implementations.
  
Building platform services within cloud infrastructure.
  
Support our clients with onboarding of our platform services.
  
  

Who are you?Webelieve you have a passion for cloud development and enjoy creating value and solving problems for clients. In this client-facing role, you’re proactive in proposing solutions and suggestions to improve client environments, seeing opportunities and potential for enhancements. You’re open-minded, positive, driven, and curious, with a strong belief in team collaboration and knowledge sharing.
  
What experiences do you bring?
  
Customer-centric mindset with the ability to efficiently handle several cases and activities from multiple customers simultaneously.
  
Ability to understand customers’ problems and develop effective solutions, while also identifying new opportunities to provide additional value.
  
Deep knowledge in infrastructure technologies, including cloud computing (Azure and AWS), networking, security, and AI solutions.
  
Hands-on experience with Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and development and management of CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions.
  
Programming/scripting with Python, Go, Bash or similar.
  
Great communication skills, both verbal and written in Swedish and/or English.
  
  

And if you come with below experiences, we see it as a great advantage
  
Certifications in Azure and AWS.
  
Container orchestration using Kubernetes.
  
Experience working with Go microservices.
  
Experience with developer platform products such as Backstage or similar.
  
  

Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.
  
  

What we offerBeing a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.To learn more about our benefits, scroll down
  
LocationWe have offices located in central Stockholm at Torsgatan 4. As we encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together), we see that you are based in commuting distance to our office location and that you are happy to come into the office a few times a week.
  
How to applyWehope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy. We are constantly recruiting, so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.We look forward hearing from you!

title: Data Scientist
description:
**Data Scientist**


Do you want to design cutting-edge AI and ML solutions, work with advanced data models, and empower businesses with innovative analytics?


Nexer Insight is looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Stockholm, Malmö, or Gothenburg. We invite you to embark on an exciting journey where you'll work with fascinating clients, tackle varied and challenging tasks, and enjoy exceptional benefits. At Nexer Insight, we are committed to leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI to drive innovation and deliver impactful solutions for our clients.

**Nexer Insight**


Nexer Insight is a company that embodies entrepreneurship and innovation. As a Data Scientist with us, you'll work with cutting-edge technologies, including LLMs (Large Language Models), RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and advanced AI solutions. We value teamwork, professional growth, and a vibrant community spirit. With us, you'll have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, collaborate with experts in the field, and make a meaningful impact in the intersection of data science and AI.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop advanced AI/ML models and design solutions leveraging LLMs for various AI use cases, including RAG and intelligent agents.
* Apply machine learning, statistical methods, and predictive modeling to solve real-world problems.
* Build and deploy data pipelines and cloud-based architectures for ML workloads and MLOps.
* Innovate and collaborate with clients to discover new business opportunities and develop tailored solutions.
* Work with NLP, computer vision, and containerized applications to deliver high-impact projects.
* Leverage platforms like Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake, and Azure ML for scalable and efficient workflows.
* Promote best practices for data science, from architecture and data quality to reliability and performance.

**Who You Are**


We expect you to have:

* Minimum 4 years within Data Science
* Strong understanding of LLMs and experience building solutions on top of them for AI-driven solutions.
* Experience with RAG and AI-driven agents.
* An analytical mindset and strong business acumen.
* Problem-solving aptitude and a proactive mindset.
* Hands-on experience with applied ML, statistics, and cloud architectures for MLOps.
* Proficiency in Python, PySpark, and familiarity with tools like Databricks.
* Knowledge of computer vision, NLP, SQL, and containerized apps.
* Experience with Azure cloud services such as Azure ML and Azure Data Lake.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.




**Why Nexer Insight?**


At Nexer Insight, we invest in our employees by providing professional development, certifications, and a vibrant working culture. With us, you'll be part of a team pushing boundaries and using advanced data science to create meaningful solutions for leading clients.


Are you ready to take the next step in your career and explore the forefront of AI and data science? Apply today and join us on this exciting journey!

title: Enterprise Architect
description:
Vill du vara med och skapa framtidens organisationer där verksamhetsutveckling och teknik samverkar?


Inom Knowit Insight, som är Knowits managementkonsultverksamhet, är vi 550 konsulter som hjälper organisationer att utvecklas genom att realisera digitaliseringens fulla potential. Från Göteborgskontoret utgår närmare 40 av dessa konsulter och nu söker vi fler till vårt team då vi ser ett ökat behov hos våra kunder.


På **Knowit Insight Väst** söker vi nu en **Enterprise Architect** som kan hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i en komplex digital värld och skapa hållbara lösningar för framtiden.


Här får du kombinera din strategiska förmåga med teknisk förståelse i en dynamisk och inkluderande arbetsmiljö. Som Enterprise Architect på Knowit är du en central del av våra kunders förändringsresor. Du arbetar nära verksamhetsledningar och team för att skapa lösningar som förenar affärsmål med tekniska möjligheter. Rollen erbjuder både strategiskt ansvar och möjligheten att arbeta hands-on med att modellera och visualisera verksamhets- och systemarkitekturer.


I din vardag kommer du att:

* **Utveckla verksamhetsarkitekturer** som kopplar ihop affärsstrategi, processer och tekniska lösningar.
* **Modellera och designa arkitekturer** som tydliggör verksamhetsprocesser, informationsflöden och tekniska strukturer.
* **Analysera och visualisera** komplexa system och organisationer för att skapa tydlighet och gemensam förståelse.


Vi söker dig som är både strategisk och operativ, och som trivs med att arbeta i gränslandet mellan verksamhet och teknik. Du är lyhörd, samarbetsorienterad och engagerad i att skapa lösningar som fungerar för alla intressenter – från verksamhetsledning till tekniska team.

**Vi tror att du har:**

* Minst **5 års erfarenhet** av arbete som Enterprise Architect, verksamhetsarkitekt eller i en liknande roll.
* Erfarenhet av att **modellera arkitekturer** på olika nivåer, inklusive verksamhets-, informations- och tekniska lager.
* God förståelse för verksamhetsprocesser och organisationsdesign.
* **Flytande svenska och engelska** i tal och skrift.
* Förmåga att förklara komplexa koncept på ett enkelt och engagerande sätt för olika målgrupper.


Utöver ovan ser vi nedan erfarenheter som meriterande:

* Kunskap inom molnarkitektur, systemintegration eller moderna plattformar (t.ex. Azure, AWS, Google Cloud).
* Erfarenhet av TOGAF, ArchiMate eller andra relevanta ramverk.
* Bakgrund inom konsultbranschen och vana vid kundnära arbete.

**Vad erbjuder vi?**


Att vara konsult på Knowit Insight innebär ett varierande arbete med stora möjligheter att påverka. Hos oss träffar du engagerade kollegor, får spännande utmaningar och möjligheter till roliga uppdrag. Du har tillgång till vårt fina kontor centralt i Göteborg där vi har möjlighet att ses för såväl erfarenhetsutbyten och kompetensutveckling, som för trevligt socialt umgänge. Vi är en engagerad och driven grupp som med en mix av yrkesstolthet, skicklighet och empati både stöttar, sporrar och lär av varandra!

**Ansökan**


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Vi använder oss av löpande urval och ser gärna att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.


Anställningsform: Heltid.


Utbildning: Relevant högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.


Eventuella frågor om tjänsten eller rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Mathilda Hult som du kan kontakta på telefonnummer 0702-198508 eller e-post mathilda.hult@knowit.se


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

**Om Knowit**


Knowits vision är att skapa ett hållbart och mänskligt samhälle genom digitalisering och innovation. Vi skiljer oss från andra konsultbolag genom en decentraliserad organisation och vårt agila arbetssätt i kunduppdrag. Verksamheten är indelad i fyra affärsområden, Solutions, Experience, Connectivity och Insight som erbjuder tjänster inom skräddarsydd systemutveckling, digitala kundupplevelser, internet of things, cloud, cybersäkerhet och managementkonsulting.


Knowit grundades 1990 och har cirka 4 400 medarbetare, huvudsakligen i Norden, men även i Tyskland och Polen. Knowit AB (publ) börsnoterades 1997, och finns i dag på NASDAQ OMX Stockholm Mid Cap.

title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
**About Us**



Integrity360 is one of Europe’s leading cyber security specialists operating from office locations spread out across Europe, providing a comprehensive range of professional, support and managed cyber security services for our 300+ clients. With four top-class Security Operation Centers, we offer a complete end-to-end security services covering our clients’ security from every angle. Our services include Managed Security, Cyber Security Testing, Incident Response, Security Integration, PCI Compliance and Cyber Risk & Assurance services.

  

What sets Integrity360 apart is our excellent team of people that drive the business forward. The company was founded with a focus on technical expertise and that philosophy remains today. The skills and experience in our company are some of the greatest in the industry and clients remain with Integrity360 because they can rely on and trust us to go above and beyond to ensure their needs are met. Listed multiple times on Gartner Market Guides for Managed Security Services.

 **Job Role / Responsibilities**



This is a full-time position with the Integrity360 office in Stockholm, Sweden. The position is responsible for performing all forms of complex technical activities (including the Internal / External Network, Applications, Cloud, Mobile, etc.). These assessments will occasionally be done at the client site, primarily in Sweden. Proficiency in communication is essential, both written and verbal, as well as the ability to convey complex technical information to key international clients.

 **Primary Duties/Responsibilities include:**


* Perform in-depth penetration tests across applications, infrastructure, cloud and mobile platforms.
* Execute zero-knowledge black-box, grey-box and white-box penetration tests of specific areas within the enterprise.
* Perform tests and assessments in the cloud, including but not limited to AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.
* Perform security reviews of servers, network devices, architecture and application designs.
* Act as an escalation point for team members regarding project-related issues.
* Deliver pre-sales support, including project scoping, estimations, and technical assistance via calls, meetings, and presentations with key clients.
* Enhance Integrity360's security offerings, refining methodologies, reporting standards, and educational materials.
* Represent Integrity360 at international events, forums or training events.
* Demonstrate the ability to be an industry expert.

  


**Required Skills / Experience**


* 5+ or more years’ experience in penetration testing or red team operations, including testing critical functionality, banking systems and more.
* Manual penetration testing experience above and beyond running automated tools.
* Expertise in AWS, Azure, and cloud-native technologies, including VMs, containers, and infrastructure as code.
* Previous experience as a Subject Matter Expert, or similar role.
* Experience in testing ICS, SCADA, mainframes, containers, hardware appliances,
* Excellent understanding of firewalls, proxies, iptables, AVs and EDR products, VPNs, IDS/IPS, and various networking concepts.
* Knowledge of wireless technologies, mainly RF, Cellular, NFC, and Bluetooth technology.
* Experience in testing OSX / iOS and Android devices.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in front of key clients.
* Experience in developing custom security tools and scripts.
* Fluency in one or more programming or scripting languages: Java, Python, C/C++, C#, .NET, ASP, PHP,

  


**Certifications/Qualifications**


* One or more industry leading certification (OSCP, CRTE, CRTO, OSCE, OSWP, ARTE, CPTS, etc.)
* CHECK Team Leader or equivalent is a plus.
* Computer Sciences, IT or Cybersecurity related degree is a plus.

  


**Working at Integrity360**



At Integrity360 we aim to reflect what’s important through the benefits we offer. We survey our people regularly and encourage discussions around these tops so we can understand what really makes a difference. Our benefits priorities are physical, mental and financial wellbeing.

 **Mental & Physical wellbeing benefits:**


* Private healthcare provided by Attunda Hälsan
* Health insurance provided by Söderberg and Partners
* Onsite Gym (Kista office)
* SEK 5,000.00/year for Friskvårdbidrag, our allowance can be used for Gym memberships, to improve health and more!

  


**Financial wellbeing:**



We guarantee that every employee will have their pay reviewed at least once every year, if not more regularly. We aim to pay within the market range for all roles and keep pace with inflation on average.



What we offer:


* Twice yearly salary reviews
* 6% Contributory Pension
* Income Protection
* Death-in-Service cover

  


**Other benefits include:**


* 30 days’ annual leave and options to carry over 5 days to the next financial year
* Our L&D program, we work with various platforms including Cybrary, Udemy, Preply, Pluralsight, Swift and HTB ensuring our people are up to date with their industry knowledge. Offering opportunities to further upskill and gain industry leading certifications.
company_addresses: Integrity360, The Concourse, Block D, Beacon Court, Sandyford, Co. Dublin, Ireland
company_description: Integrity360 is one of Europe's leading cyber security services and solutions provider.

title: Sjuksköterska måndag till fredag till smärtrehabiliteringsavdelning!
description:
Verksamhetsområde geriatrik, rehabilitering och smärtcentrum består av flera olika sektioner. Samtliga sektioner kännetecknas av välfungerande interprofessionellt samarbete, något vi är mycket stolta över. Vi vill att du ska känna dig välkommen till oss, som ny erbjuds du handledning, introduktion och yrkesnätverk.  

  

Inom smärtcentrum är vi experter på rehabilitering och smärta men strävar alltid efter att bli ännu bättre. Som en del i detta ligger ett stort fokus på forskning och framsteg, både inom och utanför sjukhuset. Som medarbetare är du en viktig del i detta, det är naturligt för dig att vilja utvecklas och driva verksamheten framåt.  

  

Vi söker nu dig som är intresserad av att arbeta på vår trevliga smärtrehabiliteringsavdelning. Avdelningen har max 8 patienter i veckan och du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med ett erfaret och professionellt team. Du kommer att få handledning och fördjupad undervisning om specialområdet smärta under introduktionstiden. Vi strävar efter att ha en hög nivå och fortbildning erbjuds löpande.  

  

Som sjuksköterska är du en självklar teammedlem där övriga professioner är läkare, psykolog, kurator, arbetsterapeut och fysioterapeut. På Smärtrehabiliteringen finns en sjuksköterskegrupp om 3 personer, varav två arbetar på avdelningen och en på vår mottagning. Du blir en viktig person i teamarbetet där man stöttar och hjälper varandra samtidigt som du kommer att arbeta självständigt.  

På avdelningen arbetar också fyra duktiga undersköterskor varav en enbart arbetar natt.  

  

Smärtrehabiliteringsavdelningen ligger ute på specialistrehabiliteringsenheten vid Ultuna, Genetikvägen 4.  

  

**Ditt uppdrag**  

Att vara sjuksköterska på smärtrehabiliteringsavdelningen är ett spännande och roligt jobb! Det innebär att du får möta många komplexa patienter.  

  

Det finns goda möjligheter att få en god kontakt med både team och patienter. Du är delaktig i planeringen av patientens rehabilitering, undervisar i grupp/individuellt samt utför terapeutiskt arbete och har ansvar för arbetet med levnadsvanor. Du är aktiv i utvecklingsarbetet på avdelningen. Vi arbetar utifrån en helhetssyn på våra patienter och psykologiskt/psykiatriskt perspektiv är en del i vårt arbete. Vi har ett genomgående beteendeinriktat, kognitivt förhållningssätt.  

  

Eftersom Akademiska sjukhuset är ett universitetssjukhus med uppdrag att bedriva sjukvård och forskning får du också möjligheten att vara med och utveckla vården för våra patienter.  

  

**Dina kvalifikationer**  

Vi söker dig som är legitimerad sjuksköterska med några års erfarenhet av sjuksköterskeyrket. Det är meriterande om du har vidareutbildning av KBT steg 1 och mycket meriterande om du har arbetat med smärtrehabilitering/smärta eller om du har erfarenhet från psykiatri/beroende/onkologi. Erfarenhet från motiverande samtal är också meriterande.  

  

Du arbetar alltid med patientens bästa i fokus och är ansvarstagande i ditt arbete och du blir en viktig person för patienterna i deras rehabiliteringsprocess. Arbetet innebär även en del administrativa arbetsuppgifter så du bör ha god organisationsförmåga och gilla ordning och reda. Du är också en positiv kollega som vill bidra till en god arbetsmiljö.  

  

**Din kompetens**  

Vi ser att du är en person som tar initiativ och sätter igång aktiviteter. Du tar ansvar för din uppgift och driver dina processer vidare på ett strukturerat sätt. Du har även lätt för att anpassa dig till ändrade omständigheter och ser möjligheterna i förändringar. Vidare arbetar du bra med andra människor, är lyhörd och lösningsfokuserad.  

  

**Vi erbjuder**  

Vi erbjuder ett vikariat under en föräldraledighet från 2025-05-15 till 2026-08-31. Arbetstiden är måndag till fredag, dagtid. Tillträde efter överenskommelse.  

  

Hos oss får du förmåner som gör skillnad, läs om förmånerna här.  

  

**Vill du veta mer?**  

Avdelningschef Karin Cloud Mildton, 018-617 37 26  

Biträdande avdelningschef Sara Marklund, 018-611 43 89  

Facklig kontaktperson, Vårdförbundet nås via växeln 018-611 00 00  

  

**Vill du jobba med oss?**  

Välkommen med din ansökan via länken nedan. Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske fortlöpande under ansökningstiden.  

  

*Region Uppsala värdesätter de kvaliteter som jämn könsfördelning och mångfald tillför verksamheten. Vi ser därför gärna sökande av alla kön och med olika födelsebakgrund, funktionalitet och livserfarenhet.*  

  

*Region Uppsala krigsplacerar all tillsvidareanställd personal utifrån totalförsvarets behov. Detta innebär för den enskilda medarbetaren inga förpliktelser i fredstid utan är enkom en planeringsåtgärd.*  

  

*Kontroll mot misstanke- och belastningsregister kommer att göras avseende alla personer som arbetsgivaren har för avsikt att anställa eller anlita för patientnära arbete utifrån att de kan komma att arbeta inom psykiatrisk sjukvård, habilitering, vård av barn och ungdom eller tvångsvård av missbrukare, områden som omfattas av fakultativa registerutdrag. Detta gäller således alla som kommer att arbeta patientnära även om arbetsuppgifterna i nuläget inte är tänkta att huvudsakligen innehålla arbete med ovan nämnda patientgrupper.*

title: Senior Penetration Tester
description:
*Are you a seasoned penetration tester? Do you want to work in an international environment with some of the best cybersecurity professionals in the industry? We are looking for you to be a part of us!*


We are looking for a Senior Penetration Tester to join the Technical Assessments service unit at DNV Cyber in Stockholm. You will be joining a team of security specialists advising DNV Cyber clients as they rely on us to find vulnerabilities in their networks, systems and applications.


As a Senior Penetration Tester, you will play a crucial role in advising our clients as they rely on us to find vulnerabilities in their network setups, web and mobile applications, physical devices or cloud deployments. In addition, you will have an opportunity to work with some very security-minded colleagues and clients.

**Most of your daily work will revolve around security assessments where the following tasks are expected:**

* Identify vulnerabilities in applications, systems and networks.
* Document the vulnerabilities by describing them, providing reproduction and remediation steps and classifying their severity according to industry standards.
* Ensure project deadlines are met, and clients are kept up to date on meeting project milestones.
* Interact with customers in a collaborative, consultative manner to deliver world-class results.

**You have the following**

* Proven experience as a penetration tester, with hands-on experience in ethical hacking
* Deep understanding of cybersecurity and strong technical skills
* Strong understanding of web application security, network security, and operating system security
* Ability to identify vulnerabilities in both Windows and Linux systems.
* Experience with different hacking tools
* Excellent communication and reporting skills in both Swedish and English
* Due to the nature of the work, we require a Swedish or EU citizenship, or a work permit in Sweden.

**Excellent consultant skills are essential for long term success; these soft skills will make you successful in this role:**

* Communication skills; able to adapt the message to different situations and audiences.
* Listening skills; understand the customers and be able to empathize with them.
* Relaxed attitude; able to adapt to moving requirements and ways of working.
* Constant learning attitude; not afraid to take on new challenges.


As a Senior Penetration Tester, you actively want to stay up to date with the latest technologies. To succeed in this role, we believe you are a specialist in a particular area or technology, driven by the ambition to create a meaningful impact.

**Be one of us**


We have recently embarked on an exciting journey – formerly known as Nixu, now combined forces with DNV and Applied Risk, with the goal of creating a leading European cyber security services business.


At DNV Cyber, we are passionate about cybersecurity and take pride in the way we are impacting the society we live in. We encourage you to excel professionally through knowledge sharing and demanding cases. At DNV Cyber, you'll have 500 colleagues who share an interest in cyber security with you.


At DNV Cyber, you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of cases and customers from various industries. You will be working in an international environment with global opportunities to advance in your career. With us, you will be surrounded by the most talented people in the cyber security field. We encourage you to keep challenging yourself by exploring new areas of expertise.


Join us on an exciting adventure of growth, meaningful work, and shaping the future through cyber security!

**Apply now!**


We are excited to connect with you, so please apply today! This position is full-time and based in Stockholm. The job starts in August -25.

**Need more information?**


If you have any questions regarding this position, please reach out to the hiring manager Mikael Lagström, mikael.lagstrom[at]dnv.com

*A security background check will be a part of the recruitment process.*

title: M3 Integrationskonsult
description:
### **Arbetsuppgifter**

**S****om integrationskonsult** hos oss får du möjligheten att vara delaktig i spännande projekt tillsammans med andra kollegor. Du är med och ansvarar för att planera, genomföra samt fastställa design och arkitektur av integrationslösningar i våra kundprojekt. Du kommer arbeta med integrationer mellan olika system, *såsom e-handel, CRM och ERP*, och du kommer vara involverad i alla faser av projekten. Allt ifrån förstudie, design av integrationslösning, arkitektur, implementation och test.  

  



### **Kravprofil**


Max tre punkter, ta enbart med vad som faktiskt är krav och väv in meriterande och övriga meriter under arbetsuppgifter. Fokusera snarare på vad de ska kunna utföra, även vad de gjort tidigare.

* Levererat bra resultat i stora som små integrationsprojekt
* Är uppe i molnet eller redo att göra jobbet att ta dig dit – kunskap inom Amazon Cloud eller liknande är ett plus ️
* Konsulterfarenhet är väldigt meriterande
* Du har kunskaper inom Infors integrationsverktyg
* *Du kan svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift*  

  

*This position requires you to be located in Sweden and have a valid VISA.*

#### **Ansökan och nästa steg**


Hos oss ansöker du enkelt med din LinkedIn-profil eller CV, utan att behöva fylla i långa frågeformulär. Du behöver inte skicka in något personligt brev.


I vår rekryteringsprocess använder vi logik- och personlighetstester. Vi tar alltid referenser och genomför en bakgrundskontroll innan anställning eller erbjudande ges. Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Daniel Sparrow. Intervjuer sker löpande.


Vi använder **Trustcruit** för att samla in anonym feedback om din upplevelse som kandidat. Det tar bara några minuter och hjälper oss att förbättra vår rekryteringsprocess.

### **Om Columbus M3**

**Vilka är vi?** Som partner till Infor är vi ett team av kompetenta M3-konsulter som levererar M3 till våra kunder. Vi arbetar med stora, globala och spännande kunder! Här kan du läsa mer om våra kundprojekt.


**Varför?** Vi vill hjälpa våra kunder att nå sina affärsmål och göra deras vardag mer effektiv! Målet är att säkerställa deras långsiktiga framgång och guida kunderna genom att vara deras *Trusted Advisor.* Därför erbjuder vi även underhåll, support och vidareutveckling av deras lösningar. Vi samarbetar med kunderna för att optimera deras system, förbättra prestanda och förebygga incidenter.  

  



### **Jobba på Columbus**


Columbus är ett företag där värderingar står i centrum, där engagerade medarbetare stöttar varandra genom både toppar och dalar. Vi tror på balans mellan jobb och fritid – oavsett om det handlar om att lämna på förskola eller att ta emot ett paket "någon gång mellan 10 och 19". Hos oss finns tid för återhämtning, och vi arbetar proaktivt med fokus på framtiden. Vi vet också hur man firar framgångar, med allt från fika och lyxiga frukostar till after work på kontoret, och gör det gärna ofta!

 **Stay curious, Build trust, Collaborate, Deliver customer success** - Vi vill hävda att våra värdeord gör mer nytta än att bara hänga snyggt på väggen! Dessa vägleder vårt arbete både internt och externt. Genom långsiktiga partnerskap med våra kunder, interna initiativ med Culture Ambassadors, kompetensutveckling inom affärsområdena till högkvalitativa lösningar till våra kunder.  

  



### **Vad andra säger om oss**


Intresserad av Columbus bakom kulisserna? Varje vecka låter vi en kollega ta över vårt Instagram-konto.


På Careereye kan nuvarande och tidigare medarbetare dela sina **ofilterare omdömen om hur det är att arbeta hos oss**. Klicka nedan för att läsa deras upplevelser.
company_description: We are the #1 one partner in the Nordics when it comes to digital transformation. We help our customers with solutions according to industry-specific needs to reach their full potential.

title: Marketing and Lead Generation Manager (Temporary position - 1 year - parental leave cover)
description:
- Devoteam is a leading IT consulting company with strong roots in Malmö's tech community, both as Devoteam and formerly Jayway. We have been around for 25 years and operate in 30 countries with over 11,000 employees. In Sweden (Creative Tech), we focus on innovative, tailor-made solutions based on long-term partnerships.


We are driven by a passion for technology and innovation and are committed to creating long-term relationships with both customers and employees. We offer services and comprehensive solutions in cloud, data, app modernization, product design, and more. Among our initiatives is Øredev , one of Scandinavia's largest developer conferences, which we co-founded.

  
We are currently looking for a skilled Business Developer with a focus on marketing and lead generation as our current Business Developer is going on parental leave. This is a full-time (100%), 1-year fixed-term contract to cover parental leave, with a start date of February 24, 2025, and an end date of April 10, 2026. The workplace for this role is Malmö and surrounding areas.


**About the role**  

As a Business Developer at Devoteam in Malmö, you will drive growth by creating and implementing marketing strategies and activities related to lead generation for Devoteam Creative Tech in Malmö and Halmstad. You will work closely with the sales team to identify potential customers, generate leads, and increase Devoteam's market visibility.


**What we expect from you:**

* Drive and execute marketing activities: You will be responsible for driving and executing marketing activities in line with Devoteam's marketing plan. This includes developing concepts, when needed, to achieve goals.
* Select appropriate marketing channels: We have a continuous presence on LinkedIn, Instagram, and our own website. You will identify target audiences, select appropriate marketing channels, and create engaging content.
* Generate leads: You will be responsible for generating leads through various channels, such as digital marketing, prospecting, and events. You will also participate in customer meetings to qualify leads and hand them over to the sales team.
* Increase brand awareness: You will work to increase Devoteam's brand awareness and strengthen the company's position as a leading player in digital transformation.
* Collaborate with the sales team & team leader: You will work closely with the sales team and team leader to ensure that marketing activities are aligned with their needs.
* Develop a new marketing plan for 2026: Around the turn of the year, we need to evaluate the past year and develop a new marketing plan together with the sales team.

  
**Qualifications and Experience**

* At least 2 years of experience in marketing and lead generation, preferably within the IT industry.
* Knowledge of digital marketing.
* Experience in organizing events.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.

**Personal Qualities**

* Driven and results-oriented.
* Creative and innovative.
* Strong collaboration and communication skills.

  
- **What Devoteam Offers**


	* An exciting and challenging role in an international company.
	* Opportunity to work with the latest technologies and solutions.
	* A flexible and innovative work environment.**Benefits and Practical Information**


	* Leave and pension: We offer 30 days of vacation and occupational pension similar to ITP1.
	* Health and well-being: Health checks over 35+, health grants 5000 SEK, and lunch yoga/ group exercise at the office.
	* Equipment: You choose tools, either Mac or PC.**Application**  

To apply, please submit your application via the link. We encourage early applications as we review them continuously.


For any questions, please contact our reqruiter Sanna Ekelöf. Sanna will be your primary contact throughout the recruitment process.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Lead Engineer
description:
**Join Qura as Lead Engineer** 




  





 At Qura (
 
 https://www.qura.law/
 
 ), we’re transforming knowledge work and legal research. We’re putting AI search engines on large legal databases that are currently locked away in outdated digital libraries—unlocking a new era of efficiency and accessibility.
 



 Our journey started in 2024.
 


* In April, we launched our first beta in Sweden. Since then, 75 firms and hundreds of lawyers have paid to use Qura for thousands of AI-searches.
* In June, we raised M2.1 € from Cherry Ventures and top angels & lawyers.
* In September, we launched Qura EU with success across over 10 countries.



 Now, we are a team of 9 people looking to build the future of legal research and to recruit the next leader in our tech team.
 



  





**The Role** 




 We’re seeking a
 **Lead Engineer** 
 to help lead and shape Qura’s technology. You’ll collaborate directly with our CTO on critical technical decisions and guide our three main teams—AI, platform, and data.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Strategic Leadership** 
 : Share ownership of Qura’s tech vision, making high-level architectural decisions and long-term strategy.
* **Team Leadership** 
 : Guide and mentor our AI, platform, and data teams, ensuring they work efficiently and effectively.
* **Hands-On Development** 
 : Contribute directly to our codebase—creating, testing, and deploying features at startup speed.



  





**Who You Are** 



* **Experience** 
 : 5+ years scaling tech teams in fast-paced startups (or demonstrable equivalent).
* **Expertise** 
 : Strong background in at least one of the following areas: AI/ML, full-stack/platform development, or large-scale data infrastructure.
* **Ownership Mentality** 
 : You take pride in your work, thrive on responsibility, and own your projects end-to-end.
* **Execution Focused** 
 : You value speed, iterative development, and collaboration in a dynamic startup environment.



  





**Why Qura?** 



* **Impact:** 
 Be at the forefront of the AI revolution in knowledge work.
* **Growth:** 
 Opportunity to make a significant impact in a fast-growing startup.
* **Culture:** 
 Work with a small, high-caliber team that values innovation, ownership and rapid execution.
* Competitive salary plus stock options.



  





**Specifications:** 



* **Starting date:** 
 ASAP
* **Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden (In-person collaboration in our office in central Stockholm is essential)

title: Workplace Architect
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Architect for Workplace Services to drive technical transitions across multiple technical towers at Level 4. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in a wide range of technologies and possess strong architectural skills to ensure seamless and efficient transitions.
 



  
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



 - Lead and manage technical transitions across multiple technical towers, ensuring minimal disruption to operations.
 



 - Develop and implement architectural solutions for Active Directory, Entra ID, M365 apps (including OneDrive, Exchange Online, Teams, SharePoint Online), Copilot agents, Power Platform, and LRS VPSX printing and output management.
 



 - Provide advanced support and troubleshooting for Intune and SCCM for Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android.
 



 - Design and deploy Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops, including Citrix Cloud, and Azure Virtual Desktops and Windows 365 PC.
 



 - Oversee application packaging for Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android.
 



 - Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation, including Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), High-Level Designs (HLDs), and Low-Level Designs (LLDs).
 



 - Automate tasks and processes using PowerShell scripting and other automation tools.
 



 - Conduct knowledge transfer sessions to train and mentor team members and ensure smooth transitions.
 



 - Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices in workplace services and automation.
 


* - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy integrated workplace services solutions.

title: Cloud Account Manager
description:
Savecore söker dig som är utåtriktad, har hög energi och en stor nyfikenhet!
 



 Dina personliga egenskaper värdesätter vi högt, saknar du någon del av de yrkesmässiga egenskaperna vi efterfrågar hjälper vi dig att fortsätta utvecklas.
 



  





 För att ha bästa möjliga förutsättning att lyckas som Cloud Account Manager hos oss ser vi gärna att du har en bakgrund inom försäljning i IT-branschen med ett befintligt kontaktnät med kunder. Tidigare erfarenhet eller kunskap av molntjänster och Managed Services är meriterande. Vi ser dig som en positiv, nyfiken, driven och kommunikativ person. Är du samarbetsvillig men också benägen att driva arbetsuppgifterna självständigt tror vi att den här rollen passar dig.
 



  





 Som Cloud Account Manager har du ansvar för hela säljcykeln från affärsmöjlighet till avtalsförhandling och resultatansvar, med stöttning från våra kompetenta tekniker och resten av säljteamet. Ditt fokus är försäljning till nykund av våra molntjänster bestående av bland annat BaaS, IaaS och PaaS mfl.
 



  





 En arbetsdag för dig innebär flexibilitet med både varierande och återkommande uppgifter. Då varje kund är unik är det av stor vikt att du är lyhörd gentemot kunder för att kunna hjälpa dem på bästa sätt att skräddarsy våra tjänster utefter deras behov. Våra kunder spänner från små och medelstora företag till multinationella koncerner.
 



  





 Savecore är ett IT-företag som tillhandahåller absolut spjutspetskompetens inom områden som server, lagring och databas. Savecore har idag kontor i Solna och huvudkontor i Sundsvall.
 



 Tjänsten är placerad på vårt kontor i Solna och din primära uppgift kommer att vara uppsökande försäljning med regionsansvar för att aktivt utveckla verksamheten.
 



  





**Tillträde:** 




 Omgående.
 



  





 På Savecore erbjuds du flexibla arbetstider med möjlighet att arbeta från kontor eller distans. Att utgå från kontoret ett par dagar i veckan är viktigt för denna rollen.
 



  





 För oss som företag är det viktigt att våra medarbetare har en bra harmoni mellan arbete och privatliv.
 



  





 Ansökan
 



 Vi anser att rätt person är viktigare än erfarenhet, skicka in din ansökan med referenser redan idag så berättar vi mer om vad vi har att erbjuda dig. Intervjuer sker löpande, ansökan skickas till jobs@savecore.se. Vid eventuella frågor, vänligen kontakta Nicklas Ericsson: nicklas@savecore.se

title: Data & Analytics Governance specialist
description:
**Role**
* Act as subject matter expert for data governance topics in data and analytics.
* Work together with the Data Governance team to roll out governance capabilities for company’s most critical data assets.
* Define principles, guardrails and guidelines together with the product teams to secure that solutions are aligned with the architectural principles of Data Mesh.
* Serve as a link between business and tech to ensure that the management of data is in line with current and future business requirements of the company.
* Implement data governance roles and responsibilities to ensure clear accountability for the most critical data assets.


**Essential Requirements**
* Experience in driving data governance topics in data and analytics.
* Experience from working in data mesh architecture.
* Experience from writing guidelines and guardrails.
* Experience from large and global organizations.
* Used to working with both technical and business questions.
* Excellent verbal communication and documentation capacity in English.


 It is beneficial if you have previous experience from project management and agile way of working.
   

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** 
**when applying.**
**Utilization** 
**:** 
 100
 **%**
**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Period** 
 : 27-01-2025-30-06-2025
   

  

**Last day to apply** 
 : 31-01-2025
   

  

 We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: Technical Product Owner
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
 Operative/Technical Product Owner (OPO) for the auxiliary control system (XCS).
   

  

 Responsibility to make sure that the backlog for the team is always up-to-date and prioritized.
   

  

 It means also to cooperate with Strategic Product Management, HW design, Project Management, SW teams, and OPOs globally on different sites.
   

  

 There will be a need to describe the value to be delivered to the team and work together to refine the backlog into concrete stories with a clear definition of what should be done.
   

  

**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Experienced agile Product Owner.
* Embedded knowledge(HW+SW)
* Telecom competence is meriting.
* Good English speaking


**Application deadline:** 
 31-01-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*
